title: 78/512/EEC: Commission Decision of 24 May 1978 amending Decision 74/269/EEC authorizing certain Member States to make provisions which are more strict concerning the presence of 'Avena fatua' in fodder plant and cereal seed (Only the English text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 24 May 1978  amending Decision 74/269/EEC authorizing certain Member States to make provisions which are more strict concerning the presence of'Avena fatua'in fodder plant and cereal seed  (Only the English text is authentic)  (78/512/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: With effect from 1 July 1980, Article 1 of Decision 74/269/EEC is hereby repealed.
This Decision is addressed to Ireland.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 24 May 1978.
For the Commission
Finn GUNDELACH
Vice-President  (1)OJ No 125, 11.7.1966, p. 2298/66. (2)OJ No L 16, 20.1.1978, p. 23. (3)OJ No L 141, 24.5.1974, p. 19. (4)OJ No L 113, 25.4.1978, p. 1.
